versions.localizedDescription:

What's new in Version 1.5.1?
     - Minor bug fixes

     - Update AppsView to remove the duplicate app bar.
     - Fix apps not loading bug
     - Fix total app count
     - Update sources to have a loading indicator
     - Update loading status to only succeed once apps have been rendered in the apps view

The BEST alternative app store for iOS!

     - Revert workflow and project.yml

     - Minor bug fixes
     - Add maximum apps per page feature
     - Fix page counting issue
     - Major performance improvements & add seperate SharedHelpers.swift file
     - Fix bugs and duplicate issues
     - Remove more duplicate issues
     - Update workflow
     - Update workflow to cache xcodegen
     - Fix workflow file issues
     - Update workflow with xcodegen
     - Update to v1.5.0
     - Add productName to project.yml
     - Add swift version
     - Clean stale Xcode project + DerivedData

     - Update to v1.3.11
